column4: has anyone successfully installed jaunty jigalope from a usb flash drive
i get a modprobe error before install using either unetbootin or system admin create usb disk
First of all, it's jaunty jackalope, second i've setup a liveusb on a SDcard, but I haven't installed from it before.
installation requires a cd, because the installer looks for data explicitly from a mounted cd. You can trick the installer by mounting a cd image using -o loop, but that's a little tricky
